title: Investigations and Determinations
content:
Investigations and Determinations

State Regulations
§ 2.5 - Physician to submit specimens for laboratory examination in cases or suspected cases of certain communicable diseases
§ 2.6 - Investigations and Response Activities
§ 2.7 - Reported cases and suspected cases of tuberculosis to be investigated; instruction by physician
§ 2.8 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
